title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress comfortable, soft, and well-made, with a twist of artsy fashion that can be dressed up or down. They appreciate its fit, with one customer noting it comes down to just above the ankle, and consider it perfect for fall and winter wear. They like its warmth, with one describing it as the coziest cold weather sweater dress. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's very oversized. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Cozy
items.body: Warm, soft, cozy. The construction is really nice because you still have freedom of movement for your arms. So it's oversized, but also fits well. Thickness is great. Length is perfect, comes to mid-shin and I am 5'5" 115lbs. It is also stylish so you won't look frumpy. I am purchasing another one just to wear around the house during the cold Ohio winter. If you are a freeze-baby like me, you'll love this sweater dress! Read more
items.author: JC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Chic, and Perfect for Fall & Winter!
items.body: This sweater dress is everything I hoped for! The chunky knit is warm and soft without feeling heavy, and the oversized fit gives it that effortless, cozy look. The mock neck is super flattering and keeps me extra warm. Paired it with boots and it was the cutest outfit for family pictures. Definitely a new staple in my wardrobe! The added belt cinched it in to to give me a shape! Read more
items.author: Alexis Harrison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If Uggs Were a Sweater ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
items.body: Let me be clear: this dress technically has no shape. It’s basically a long, cozy rectangle pretending to be a dress. It should be ugly. It should be unflattering. It should make me look like a background extra in a Hallmark movie about knitting. But it doesn’t. Somehow, it’s adorable. It’s like wearing a nightgown that convinced everyone it’s “office appropriate.” It’s grandma-core in the absolute best way — soft, oversized, and unapologetically cozy. Think: “just got a warm hug” meets “yes, I’m chic and comfortable, deal with it.” When I wore it, everyone reacted the same way they did when Uggs first came out — “ugh, it’s so ugly… where did you get it?” They pretended to hate it, but I could see the envy in their eyes. Deep down, they wanted to be swallowed by this same shapeless cloud of comfort. If you want to look like you didn’t try but still somehow win “coziest person in the room,” this is the dress. Anywho, I’ll take 10. Read more
items.author: Libby

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars size down
items.body: I normally wear an L/LX and the medium fit right. Im 5'9" and it came to my mid calf. It gives a very cozy vibe. Pair it with some boots and gold jewelry and it will give that cozy fall/winter "chilling at the coffee shop" vibe. It is polyester but it doesnt look like it. Cute for casual outings or even work. Read more
items.author: Zee

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Potentially great
items.body: Will update when I get a replacement. Disappointed that I ordered this for next day delivery to wear soon but the plastic packaging was somehow glued to or shrink wrapped to the dress. Impossible to detach without ruining the dress. It is thick and looks like it will be a very warm piece to wear. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's OK.
items.body: It's well made. soft not itchy. I added a belt which made it not so boxy. The bottom flares out to almost balloonist look though. In my opinion it will only go with tall boots because of the way the bottom flares. I would size down though and still add a layer underneath. Read more
items.author: Amazon junkie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try it! You may be pleasantly surprised! I was!
items.body: Okay I’m a short, fat, apple shaped woman or as my niece says “ Just Juicy” so I’m always looking for clothes that help hide the bod, with out being to overwhelming and adding more bulk. I fully expected to be returning this dress, I mean come on! A sweater dress?!? What was I thinking. Needless to say I was pleasantly surprised when I tried it on. It’s soft and actually drapes and hangs well and was not overwhelming on my bowling ball physique. And also comfortable! Now let’s be honest, did it make me look like Angelina Jolie? Heck no, Not even close! Only God could do that! But it was flattering and comfortable. How many things can you say that about in fact the only bad thing I can say about it is I wish it had pockets. But I wish they put pockets and everything. Why do men’s clothes get all the pockets, and in women’s clothing it’s just a perk? Anyway if you’re on the fence, I’d say try it. I may actually get another one. Read more
items.author: Steve's Sis

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Frumpy
items.body: It’s comfy but looks like a paper bag on. I’ve tried so hard to style it but it just doesn’t look good. Would only wear around the house lol Read more
items.author: Lorna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Khaki, White, Beige, Dark Blue, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
